name: Translation Memory Index File
summary: Learn about .IIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A translation memory (TM) includes five file types including IIX, .TMW, .MDF, .MTF, and .MWF files.

description: Contains index data for a translation memory used by Trados translation software; organizes the contents of a translation memory; will be regenerated by Trados Translator's Workbench if deleted.
